property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then put a creature from your graveyard that costs less than the destroyed creature.
